text: “Me tuavimɨn mangamin dughiamɨn, Judan anabamɨn adarazi faragh mangam, eghtɨ anabar igharaziba, me danganir me ikezibar mɨrara, vaghvagh uan ababaniba itir fleghbar suigh men gɨrara mangam. Me dapiamin danganiba, me uarir gɨn zui moghɨra dar ingar. Eghtɨ Livain anabamɨn adarazi na bativamin Purirpenim ater bar men tongɨra ikɨ mangam. Eghtɨ 6plan anababar adarazi Livaibar faragh mangam, eghtɨ 6plan anababar adarazi Livaibar gɨn mangam.
